definition: see 球磨機|球磨机[qiu2 mo2 ji1]
to rub/to grind/to polish/to sharpen/to wear down/to die out/to waste time/to pester/to insist

sentences.english: High-energy ball-milling is an important method for preparing nano-metastable phases.
sentences.chinese: 高能球磨是合成纳米亚稳相的一种重要方法。

sentences.english: A few amorphous alloys of Cu-Ti were prepared by mechanical alloying(MA-CuTi).
sentences.chinese: 用机械球磨方法制得了数种不同组成的钛铜非晶合金。

sentences.english: However, there has not article about direct synthesis of aluminum nitride in high-energy ball mill.
sentences.chinese: 但用高能球磨直接氮化合成氮化铝的方法尚未报道。

sentences.english: In this paper the influence of ball-milling conditions of steel-bonded WC hard alloy on the properties has been investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了球磨工艺对WC系钢结合金性能的影响。

sentences.english: The carbothermal reduction nitridation reaction was promoted greatly after the milling of alumina for 20 hours.
sentences.chinese: 研究了氧化铝球磨对碳热还原反应合成氮化铝的作用。

sentences.english: The effects of the mechanical ball milling on the microstructure and the performance of the composite were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了机械球磨对热挤压坯料组织和性能的影响。

sentences.english: And the cement strength for ball mill slag was little better than LM .
sentences.chinese: 球磨矿渣水泥的强度比立磨的稍好。

sentences.english: Several mechanisms of AlN synthesis by carbothermal reduction nitridation method were reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 研究了氧化铝球磨对碳热还原反应合成氮化铝的作用。

sentences.english: Study is made of the vibrating ball miling for ultra-fine WC powder preparation.
sentences.chinese: 对振动球磨法制取超细碳化钨粉末进行了研究。

sentences.english: Moreover, ball-milling treatment had the most obvious effect on physicochemical properties of indica rice starch in comparison with cassava and maize starches.
sentences.chinese: 其中，球磨处理对籼米淀粉的各项理化指标影响最大。

definition: to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
filtrate/solid residue produced by a filter/mud from filtering can sugar
aggregate (sand or gravel used in concrete 混凝土)
